item.title: EP 817 - The Devil's Drum
item.itunes:title: The Cursed Drum: Satan's Favorite Toy!
item.description:
Today we meet a man who gets assaulted in an alley way by two bizarre assailants, and then we investigate the first documented poltergeist!
